text: Terebra taurina is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== == Further reading == * Bratcher T. & Cernohorsky W.O. (1987). Living terebras of the world. A monograph of the recent Terebridae of the world. American Malacologists, Melbourne, Florida & Burlington, Massachusetts. 240pp ==External links== * Category:Terebridae Category:Molluscs described in 1786
title: Terebra taurina
